storyTitle: As Department Manager, I want to generate performance reports to achieve insights into team productivity and quality metrics

testCases.title: Generate performance report with selected KPIs
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has valid role-based access permissions for performance reporting
At least one team exists in the system with performance data
Task and attendance data is available in the database
Performance Reporting module is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with KPI options including productivity metrics, quality metrics, task completion rates, and attendance statistics

steps.action: Select desired KPIs from the available options (e.g., task completion rate, quality score)
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and marked as chosen without any errors

steps.action: Apply filters for team selection by choosing a specific team from the dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter is applied and displayed in the filter summary section

steps.action: Apply time period filter by selecting start and end dates
steps.expectedResult: Time period filter is accepted and displayed in the filter summary section without validation errors

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to submit the report generation request
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is generated and visualized within 5 seconds showing selected KPIs with charts and graphs

steps.action: Review the generated report for completeness and accuracy
steps.expectedResult: Report displays all selected KPIs with corresponding data visualizations and numerical values

postconditions: Performance report is successfully generated and displayed
Report data is cached for quick access
User remains on the Performance Reporting page
Export options are available for the generated report

testCases.title: Export performance report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has valid role-based access permissions for performance reporting
Performance report has been generated with selected KPIs
Report is currently displayed on screen with visualizations
Browser allows file downloads

steps.action: Generate performance report by selecting KPIs, team filter, and time period, then clicking 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with visualizations including charts, graphs, and data tables showing selected KPIs

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: PDF file download is initiated and file is saved to the default download location

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully and contains all report data including visualizations, KPIs, filters applied, and data tables with correct formatting

steps.action: Return to the performance report page and click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Excel file download is initiated and file is saved to the default download location

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file using spreadsheet software
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully and contains all report data in structured format with separate sheets for different KPIs, proper column headers, and accurate data values

steps.action: Verify data integrity by comparing exported files with on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: Both PDF and Excel exports contain identical data to the displayed report with no data loss or corruption

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded and contains complete report data
Excel file is successfully downloaded and contains complete report data
User remains on the Performance Reporting page
Original report remains displayed on screen
Export action is logged in system audit trail

testCases.title: Verify integration of task and attendance data in performance report
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has valid role-based access permissions for performance reporting
Test team exists with known task completion data
Test team has recorded attendance data for the selected time period
Access to source task and attendance databases for verification
Expected data values are documented for comparison

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section and select KPIs that include both task metrics and attendance metrics
steps.expectedResult: KPI selection interface displays both task-related and attendance-related metrics

steps.action: Select a specific team from the team filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter is applied successfully

steps.action: Select a time period for which test data is available and click 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated and displayed with integrated data showing both task completion metrics and attendance statistics

steps.action: Review the report to identify task-related data points (e.g., tasks completed, task quality scores)
steps.expectedResult: Task data is displayed in the report with specific numerical values and visualizations

steps.action: Review the report to identify attendance-related data points (e.g., attendance rate, hours worked)
steps.expectedResult: Attendance data is displayed in the report with specific numerical values and visualizations

steps.action: Cross-reference task data in the report against the source task database records
steps.expectedResult: Report data matches source task database with 95% or higher accuracy for all task metrics

steps.action: Cross-reference attendance data in the report against the source attendance database records
steps.expectedResult: Report data matches source attendance database with 95% or higher accuracy for all attendance metrics

steps.action: Review visualized trends (charts and graphs) for task and attendance correlation
steps.expectedResult: Trends accurately reflect performance over time showing correlation between task completion and attendance patterns with correct data plotting

steps.action: Verify that integrated metrics (combining task and attendance) are calculated correctly
steps.expectedResult: Calculated metrics such as productivity rate (tasks per attendance hour) are mathematically correct based on source data

postconditions: Data integration accuracy is verified at 95% or higher
Report demonstrates successful integration of multiple data sources
Visualizations accurately represent integrated data
User has confidence in report accuracy
Verification results are documented

storyTitle: As Department Manager, I want to visualize performance trends over time to achieve better understanding of productivity changes

testCases.title: View performance trend visualization for selected time period
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has valid role-based access permissions for performance reporting
Performance data exists for multiple time periods to show trends
Performance Reporting module is accessible
Browser supports interactive visualizations

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with options for KPI selection, time period selection, and visualization controls

steps.action: Select performance KPIs for trend analysis (e.g., productivity rate, quality score, task completion rate)
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and accepted by the system without errors

steps.action: Select a time period by choosing start date and end date that spans multiple weeks or months
steps.expectedResult: Time period selections are accepted and validated successfully, displaying the selected date range

steps.action: Click 'View Trends' or 'Generate Visualization' button to request trend visualization
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and renders the visualization within 5 seconds

steps.action: Review the trend visualization displayed on screen
steps.expectedResult: Visualization displays accurate performance trends with line graphs or area charts showing KPI values over the selected time period with proper axis labels, legends, and data points

steps.action: Hover over data points in the visualization to view detailed values
steps.expectedResult: Tooltips appear showing exact KPI values, dates, and percentage changes for each data point

steps.action: Verify trend direction (increasing, decreasing, or stable) matches expected performance changes
steps.expectedResult: Trend lines accurately reflect actual performance changes over time based on underlying data

steps.action: Change the time period selection to a different date range
steps.expectedResult: Visualization updates dynamically to reflect the new time period with accurate trend data

postconditions: Performance trend visualization is successfully displayed
Visualization accurately represents data over the selected time period
User can interact with the visualization
Visualization renders within performance requirements (5 seconds)
User remains on the Performance Reporting page

testCases.title: Export performance report with visualizations
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has valid role-based access permissions for performance reporting
Performance report with trend visualizations has been generated
Visualizations are currently displayed on screen
Browser allows file downloads
PDF generation service is operational

steps.action: Generate performance report by selecting KPIs and time period, then viewing trend visualizations
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with interactive trend visualizations showing performance KPIs over time with charts and graphs

steps.action: Verify that all desired visualizations are visible on screen before export
steps.expectedResult: All trend charts, graphs, and data visualizations are fully rendered and visible

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button in the report toolbar
steps.expectedResult: PDF export process is initiated and a loading indicator appears

steps.action: Wait for the PDF file download to complete
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is successfully downloaded to the default download location within reasonable time

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader application
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully without errors or corruption

steps.action: Verify that all trend visualizations are included in the PDF export
steps.expectedResult: PDF contains all charts, graphs, and visualizations that were displayed on screen with proper formatting and resolution

steps.action: Check the quality and readability of visualizations in the PDF
steps.expectedResult: Visualizations are clear, properly sized, maintain color coding, include legends and axis labels, and are readable

steps.action: Verify that data values in the PDF match the on-screen report
steps.expectedResult: All KPI values, trend data, and time period information in the PDF are identical to the displayed report

steps.action: Check PDF metadata and formatting
steps.expectedResult: PDF includes report title, generation date, selected filters, and proper page layout with headers and footers

postconditions: PDF file is successfully downloaded with complete visualizations
Exported PDF maintains visual fidelity of on-screen report
All trend visualizations are intact and readable in the PDF
User remains on the Performance Reporting page
Export action is logged in system audit trail
Original report remains displayed on screen
